title: Ep144 Colorado Crimes
description: This week, the gals head west to mine some criminal cases in the Rockies. Topics include a cryogenically frozen mountain man, some seriously misguided investments, and a guy who could've used a belt. Pop open a fresh bottle of Winc's Sauvetage Rosé, strap on your skis, hire a financial advisor, and tune in for Colorado Crimes.
